H0.text: Tsunamis are major and potentially catastrophic events that can be predicted to occur in the Northern Hemisphere between the months of June and November.

H1.text: Hurricanes are the major and potentially catastrophic events that can be predicted to occur in the Northern Hemisphere between June and November.

H2.text: Asteroid impacts are the major and potentially catastrophic events that can be predicted to occur in the Northern Hemisphere between June and November.

H3.text: Volcanic eruptions are the major and potentially catastrophic events that can be predicted to occur in the Northern Hemisphere between the months of June and November.

A4.text: The Northern Atlantic Ocean, a distinct cyclone season occurs from June 1 to November 30
